Ensembles

Util namespace

This module contains classes that represent statistical ensembles for particular macroscopic variables.

The classes EnergyEnsemble, BoundaryEnsemble, and SpeciesEnsemble represent statistical ensembles for fluctuations of energy, boundary volume or shape, and number of molecules of a single species, respectively.

Each ensemble has a type, which specifies whether it is constrained or Boltzmann ensemble, and stores whatever parameters are needed to describe the Boltzmann ensemble. The type of a EnergyEnsemble can be "adiabatic" or "isothermal", and a value of temperature is stored if it is isothermal. Similarly, BoundaryEnsemble can be rigid or isobaric, and stores a pressure value if isobaric. Species ensemble can be "closed" or "grand", and stores a value for the chemical potential if it is grand.

We envision generalizing the BoundaryEnsemble to allow for constant stress ensembles, and may generalize some or all of the ensembles to allow for non-Boltzmann statistical ensembles.
